body_html: Some time ago we've decided that we want to slowly start moving away from using Nd suffixes for loss and activation functions. Can you add that as a special condition to the cross_entropy function? Just use an if with an input.dim() condition.
body_text: Some time ago we've decided that we want to slowly start moving away from using Nd suffixes for loss and activation functions. Can you add that as a special condition to the cross_entropy function? Just use an if with an input.dim() condition.
body: Some time ago we've decided that we want to slowly start moving away from using Nd suffixes for loss and activation functions. Can you add that as a special condition to the `cross_entropy` function? Just use an `if` with an `input.dim()` condition.
